verbose_text: To investigate the pathophysiological role of IL-17 during the development of dermal and pulmonary fibrosis, the subcutaneous BLM induced SSc model was induced in WT BALB/c, IL-1Ra-KO mice, and DKO mice (IL-1Ra-IL-17-DKO).
evidence: BLM-induced SSc model was induced in WT BALB/c, IL-1Ra-KO mice, and DKO mice (IL-1Ra-IL-17-DKO
